3651085.title: Admin Post - Open
3651085.content:
[[*user Nameless101]], given that the comment you're replying to is over 9 months old and you're not furthering the conversation about this article, you're effectively necroposting as well. 

Additionally, if you notice someone behaving in a way that should be addressed by staff, please notify a staff member rather than calling the user out yourself. Let staff handle telling site members how to act.

6259068.title: Neutralization
6259068.content: Ok, Ok, Hear me out. We use SCP-294 to turn 173 into a bunch of liquid, put lids on the cups, and then lock them away. We can just make a large containment area or give one each to various sites. The "matter" in its cell should slow down production since there's less of it, and we don't really need to test on it anymore.
6259068.html: Ok, Ok, Hear me out. We use SCP-294 to turn 173 into a bunch of liquid, put lids on the cups, and then lock them away.
